classroom:
Each circle represents a student.
The domain of 'x' consists of students in the image.
sports:
Each circle represents a person.
The domain of 'x' consists of people in the image.
The domain of 'y' consists of all sports.
pets:
Each circle represents a person.
The domain of 'x' consists of people in the image.
The domain of 'y' consists of all pets.
